eLCS_ClassAccuracy module¶

Name: eLCS_ClassAccuracy.py Authors: Ryan Urbanowicz - Written at Dartmouth College, Hanover, NH, USA Contact: ryan.j.urbanowicz@darmouth.edu Created: November 1, 2013 Description: Manages the logistical aspects of balance accuracy calculations which can handle unbalanced datasets, and/or datasets with multiple discrete classes.

algorithm published by Stewart Wilson (1995).
